scripts.clean: rimraf build dist lib generated native/build* native/lib* native/cross* native/NativeBridge* native/ace*
scripts.run2peer:all: npm run compile && npm run run2peer:libace && npm run run2peer:arkoala
scripts.lint: npm run compile && node . --linter --input-dir ./interface_sdk-js/api/@internal/component/ets/ --input-file common.d.ts --output-dir linter --linter-whitelist whitelist.json
scripts.lint:all: npm run compile && node . --linter --input-dir ./interface_sdk-js/api/@internal/component/ets/ --output-dir linter --linter-whitelist whitelist.json
scripts.check:peers: npm run run2peer:all && tsc -p ./tsconfig-generated.json && cp peer_lib/package.json.peers.in build/peers/package.json
scripts.check:subset: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets/ --output-dir ./generated/subset && tsc -p ./tsconfig-subset.json && cp peer_lib/package.json.subset.in build/subset/package.json
scripts.check:subset:run: npm run rollup:host:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-subset && node lib/main.js
scripts.check:peers:run: npm run rollup:host:full && npm run compile:native-node-host-full && node tools/check-headers.mjs && node lib/main.js
scripts.check:peers:idl: npm run compile && node . --dts2idl --input-dir ./interface_sdk-js/api/@internal/component/ets/ --output-dir ./generated/idl --verify-idl --common-to-attributes --docs=none && node . --idl2dts --input-dir ./generated/idl && node --stack_trace_limit=200 . --api-version 99  --dts2peer --input-dir ./generated/dts/ --output-dir ./generated/peers && tsc -p ./tsconfig-generated.json && cp peer_lib/package.json.peers.in build/peers/package.json && cross-env mode=peers rollup -c rollup.config.main.mjs && npm run compile:native-node-host-full && node lib/main.js
scripts.check:subset:fuzz: npm run compile && node . --dts2test --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets --output-dir ./generated/fuzz && npm run check:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-subset && node ./build/subset/generated/fuzz
scripts.check:peers:native: npm run run2peer:all && npm run compile:native-node-host-full
scripts.compile:native-node-host-java-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-java-subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-java-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-java-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-subset && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-full: npm run configure:native-node-host-full && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-node-host-full && meson install -C build-node-host-full
scripts.sanity: npm run check:peers:run && npm run run:all && npm run lint:all
scripts.compile:arkts:subset: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --need-interfaces --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets/ --output-dir ./generated/subset --language arkts && bash ./panda/arkts/arktsc --arktsconfig ./arktsconfig-subset.json --ets-module
scripts.run:panda: npm run make:arkts && npm run compile:arkts:subset && npm run run:link-panda-interfaces && npm run compile:native-node-host-subset && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native PANDA_LIB_PATH=./build/abc/subset/koalaui/arkoala-arkui/arkts/src/ DTS_INTERFACES_FILE=dts_interfaces.abc EXCLUDE_PANDA_FILE=index.abc:*Interfaces.abc bash ./panda/arkts/ark ./build/abc/subset/koalaui/arkoala-arkui/arkts/src/index.abc
scripts.compile:java: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --input-dir ./tests/java-subset/ets/ --output-dir ./generated/java-subset --language java --need-interfaces && npm run compile:native-node-host-java-subset && javac -sourcepath ./generated/java-subset/koalaui/arkoala/java/src -d ./generated/java-subset/bin ./generated/java-subset/koalaui/arkoala/java/src/org/koalaui/arkoala/Main.java
scripts.run:java: npm run compile:java && npm run compile:native-node-host-java-subset && java -Djava.library.path=./native -cp ./generated/java-subset/bin org.koalaui.arkoala.Main
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm32: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm32
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm64
scripts.compile:native-ohos-full-arm32: npm run check:peers && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs full arm32
scripts.compile:native-ohos-full-arm64: npm run check:peers && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs full arm64
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm32:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm32 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs subset arm32 mock
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm64:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs subset arm64 mock
scripts.run:ohos-full-arm32:perf: npm run compile:native-ohos-full-arm32 && node ./ohos-app/runPerf.mjs full arm32 mock
scripts.compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64:v8: npm run check:subset && node ./native/nativeBuild.mjs subset arm64 v8
scripts.run:ohos-subset-arm64:perf:v8: npm run compile:native-ohos-subset-arm64:v8 && node ohos-v8/runPerfOnV8.mjs subset
scripts.rollup:ohos:full:arm64: npm run check:peers && cross-env mode=peers isOhos=true arch=arm64 rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:full:arm32: npm run check:peers && cross-env mode=peers isOhos=true arch=arm rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:subset:arm64: npm run check:subset && cross-env mode=subset isOhos=true arch=arm64 rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:ohos:subset:arm32: npm run check:subset && cross-env mode=subset isOhos=true arch=arm rollup -c rollup.config.components.mjs
scripts.rollup:host:subset: npm run check:subset && cross-env mode=subset rollup -c rollup.config.main.mjs
scripts.rollup:host:full: npm run check:peers && cross-env mode=peers rollup -c rollup.config.main.mjs
scripts.compile:cj:native: npm run configure:cj:native && cd native && meson compile --verbose -C build-cangjie-native-dummy
scripts.run:cj: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --input-dir ./tests/cangjie-subset/ --output-dir ./generated/cangjie-subset --language cangjie && LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./native/build-cangjie-native-dummy:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH && cjpm run
